parameters.name: ActiveAddressType
parameters.description:
The address type of the database to add. Valid values:

*   Public
*   Private

parameters.name: Comment
parameters.description: The remarks of the database to add. The remarks can be up to 500 characters in length.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database to add. This parameter is required if Source is set to **Local**.

parameters.name: DatabasePort
parameters.description: The port of the database. This parameter is required if Source is set to **Local**.

parameters.name: DatabasePrivateAddress
parameters.description:
The internal IP address of the database. Specify an IPv4 address or a domain name.

>  This parameter is required if ActiveAddressType is set to Private.

parameters.name: DatabasePublicAddress
parameters.description:
The public IP address of the database. Specify an IPv4 address or a domain name.

>  This parameter is required if ActiveAddressType is set to Public.

parameters.name: DatabaseType
parameters.description:
The type of the database engine. Valid values:

*   **MySQL**
*   **Oracle**
*   **PostgreSQL**
*   **SQLServer**

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The bastion host ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: NetworkDomainId
parameters.description:
The ID of the network domain to which the database to add belongs.

>  You can call the [ListNetworkDomains](~~2758827~~) operation to query the network domain ID.

parameters.name: PolarDBEndpointType
parameters.description:
The endpoint type of the PolarDB database. This parameter is required if Source is set to PolarDB. Valid values:

*   Cluster
*   Primary

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description:
The type of the database to add. Valid values:

*   Local: on-premises database.
*   Rds: ApsaraDB RDS instance.
*   PolarDB: PolarDB cluster.

parameters.name: SourceInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID of the database to add.

> This parameter is required if **Source** is set to **Rds** or **PolarDB**.

parameters.name: SourceInstanceRegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the database to add.

>  This parameter is required if **Source** is set to **Rds** or **PolarDB**.
